<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This file implements the Loop Distribution Pass.  Its main focus is to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// distribute loops that cannot be vectorized due to dependence cycles.  It</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// tries to isolate the offending dependences into a new loop allowing</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// vectorization of the remaining parts.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For dependence analysis, the pass uses the LoopVectorizer&#39;s</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// LoopAccessAnalysis.  Because this analysis presumes no change in the order of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// memory operations, special care is taken to preserve the lexical order of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// these operations.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Similarly to the Vectorizer, the pass also supports loop versioning to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// run-time disambiguate potentially overlapping arrays.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-loopdistribute-cpp-/instpartition/#a9feb888b40cb5010ca125c921f15c0f8"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-loopdistribute-cpp-/instpartition/#a9feb888b40cb5010ca125c921f15c0f8">populateUsedSet</a>() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// FIXME: We currently don&#39;t use control-dependence but simply include all</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// blocks (possibly empty at the end) and let simplifycfg mostly clean this</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// up.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a> : OrigLoop-&gt;getBlocks())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><Highlight kind="normal">      Set.insert(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>-&gt;getTerminator());</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;Instruction &#42;, 8&gt;</a> Worklist(Set.begin(), Set.end());</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Insert instructions from the loop that we depend on.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// If this partition is mapped to the original loop then use the block from</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// the loop.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-loopdistribute-cpp-/instpartition/#a8398bc50fc5d03357ea78c2fc25c9faa"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-loopdistribute-cpp-/instpartition/#a8398bc50fc5d03357ea78c2fc25c9faa">getDistributedLoop</a>()</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Merges partitions in order to ensure that no loads are duplicated.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// We can&#39;t duplicate loads because that could potentially reorder them.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// LoopAccessAnalysis provides dependency information with the context that</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// the order of memory operation is preserved.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Return if any partitions were merged.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-loopdistribute-cpp-/instpartitioncontainer/#a154fa6f1a3465a4e2e103cf22d888a33"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-loopdistribute-cpp-/instpartitioncontainer/#a154fa6f1a3465a4e2e103cf22d888a33">mergeToAvoidDuplicatedLoads</a>() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">using </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">LoadToPartitionT = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;Instruction &#42;, InstPartition &#42;&gt;</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">using </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">ToBeMergedT = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/equivalenceclasses">EquivalenceClasses&lt;InstPartition &#42;&gt;</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"><Highlight kind="normal">    LoadToPartitionT LoadToPartition;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><Highlight kind="normal">    ToBeMergedT ToBeMerged;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Step through the partitions and create equivalence between partitions</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// that contain the same load.  Also put partitions in between them in the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// same equivalence class to avoid reordering of memory operations.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (PartitionContainerT::iterator <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = PartitionContainer.begin(),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><Highlight kind="normal">                                       E = PartitionContainer.end();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><Highlight kind="normal">         <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> != E; ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;PartI = &amp;&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If a load occurs in two partitions PartI and PartJ, merge all</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// partitions (PartI, PartJ&#93; into PartI.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;Inst : &#42;PartI)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;LoadInst&gt;</a>(Inst)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NewElt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><Highlight kind="normal">          LoadToPartitionT::iterator LoadToPart;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"><Highlight kind="normal">          std::tie(LoadToPart, NewElt) =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"><Highlight kind="normal">              LoadToPartition.insert(std::make&#95;pair(Inst, PartI));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!NewElt) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="369"><Highlight kind="normal">            <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370"><Highlight kind="normal">                <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>()</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="371"><Highlight kind="normal">                &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;LDist: Merging partitions due to this load in multiple &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372"><Highlight kind="normal">                &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;partitions: &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; PartI &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;, &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; LoadToPart-&gt;second &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373"><Highlight kind="normal">                &lt;&lt; &#42;Inst &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="374"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375"><Highlight kind="normal">            </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> PartJ = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="376"><Highlight kind="normal">            </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">do</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="377"><Highlight kind="normal">              --PartJ;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="378"><Highlight kind="normal">              ToBeMerged.unionSets(PartI, &amp;&#42;PartJ);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="379"><Highlight kind="normal">            &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (&amp;&#42;PartJ != LoadToPart-&gt;second);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="380"><Highlight kind="normal">          &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="382"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="383"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ToBeMerged.empty())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="384"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="385"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="386"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Merge the member of an equivalence class into its class leader.  This</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="387"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// makes the members empty.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="388"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ToBeMergedT::iterator <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = ToBeMerged.begin(), E = ToBeMerged.end();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="389"><Highlight kind="normal">         <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> != E; ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="390"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;isLeader())</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="394"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;PartJ : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a341215803e83773a3e97860dc291f121">make&#95;range</a>(std::next(ToBeMerged.member&#95;begin(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>)),</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00413" /><CodeLine lineNumber="413"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NewElt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="414"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemapbase/#a214e872d61db2ea8cb023f127cafd0b9">InstToPartitionIdT::iterator</a> Iter;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="432"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// This performs the main chunk of the work of cloning the loops for</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="436"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// At this point the predecessor of the preheader is either the memcheck</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="441"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(ExitBlock &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;No single exit block&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="442"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;NewLoop;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="443"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="444"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(!PartitionContainer.empty() &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;at least two partitions expected&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="445"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We&#39;re cloning the preheader along with the loop so we already made sure</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="446"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// it was empty.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="447"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(&amp;&#42;OrigPH-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a0ed5f3ab3c2e4196ee0cffffa080c062">begin</a>() == OrigPH-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#aef9e9fcf4c5dfce90276ca16d91b8e46">getTerminator</a>() &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="448"><Highlight kind="normal">           </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;preheader not empty&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="449"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="450"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Preserve the original loop ID for use after the transformation.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="451"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mdnode">MDNode</a> &#42;OrigLoopID = L-&gt;getLoopID();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="452"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="453"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Create a loop for each partition except the last.  Clone the original</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="454"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// loop before PH along with adding a preheader for the cloned loop.  Then</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="455"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// update PH to point to the newly added preheader.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="456"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;TopPH = OrigPH;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="457"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Index = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/xtensa/lib/target/xtensa/mctargetdesc/xtensaasmbackend-cpp/#a13a0babfc55adc9b798c39e65ec9e8a3">getSize</a>() - 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="458"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;Part : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a02981de53fb6ffd384d39addc4d25f37">llvm::drop&#95;begin</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6b0ac1fa4f05de76413c5e0ca6334035">llvm::reverse</a>(PartitionContainer))) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="459"><Highlight kind="normal">      NewLoop = Part.cloneLoopWithPreheader(TopPH, Pred, Index, LI, DT);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="460"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="461"><Highlight kind="normal">      Part.getVMap()&#91;ExitBlock&#93; = TopPH;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00462" /><CodeLine lineNumber="462"><Highlight kind="normal">      Part.remapInstructions();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00463" /><CodeLine lineNumber="463"><Highlight kind="normal">      setNewLoopID(OrigLoopID, &amp;Part);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="464"><Highlight kind="normal">      --Index;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="465"><Highlight kind="normal">      TopPH = NewLoop-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopbase/#ac3280e7f76f955403fe17eacf126b90d">getLoopPreheader</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00466" /><CodeLine lineNumber="466"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00470" /><CodeLine lineNumber="470"><Highlight kind="normal">    setNewLoopID(OrigLoopID, &amp;PartitionContainer.back());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="471"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00472" /><CodeLine lineNumber="472"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Now go in forward order and update the immediate dominator for the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="474"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// within the loop is updated in cloneLoopWithPreheader.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="475"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Curr = PartitionContainer.cbegin(),</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="478"><Highlight kind="normal">         <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab13c360340346d082b959b8cd79f2c1a">Next</a> != E; ++Curr, ++<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab13c360340346d082b959b8cd79f2c1a">Next</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00601" /><CodeLine lineNumber="601"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00602" /><CodeLine lineNumber="602"><Highlight kind="comment">/// For each memory instruction, this class maintains difference of the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00603" /><CodeLine lineNumber="603"><Highlight kind="comment">/// number of unsafe dependences that start out from this instruction minus</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="604"><Highlight kind="comment">/// those that end here.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="605"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="606"><Highlight kind="comment">/// By traversing the memory instructions in program order and accumulating this</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00607" /><CodeLine lineNumber="607"><Highlight kind="comment">/// number, we know whether any unsafe dependence crosses over a program point.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00608" /><CodeLine lineNumber="608" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-loopdistribute-cpp-/memoryinstructiondependences"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-loopdistribute-cpp-/memoryinstructiondependences/#aca344468bf3859d766b2dd67ceb7df59">MemoryInstructionDependences</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00609" /><CodeLine lineNumber="609"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">using </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">Dependence = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/memorydepchecker/dependence">MemoryDepChecker::Dependence</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00678" /><CodeLine lineNumber="678"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// dependence cycles to enable partial vectorization.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00679" /><CodeLine lineNumber="679"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (LAI-&gt;canVectorizeMemory())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00680" /><CodeLine lineNumber="680"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/bpf/bpfisellowering-cpp/#ab794ca855b323cdcfbf21f4a2205bdcf">fail</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;MemOpsCanBeVectorized&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00681" /><CodeLine lineNumber="681"><Highlight kind="normal">                  </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;memory operations are safe for vectorization&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00682" /><CodeLine lineNumber="682"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00683" /><CodeLine lineNumber="683"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;Dependences = LAI-&gt;getDepChecker().getDependences();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00684" /><CodeLine lineNumber="684"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!Dependences || Dependences-&gt;empty())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00685" /><CodeLine lineNumber="685"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/bpf/bpfisellowering-cpp/#ab794ca855b323cdcfbf21f4a2205bdcf">fail</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;NoUnsafeDeps&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;no unsafe dependences to isolate&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00686" /><CodeLine lineNumber="686"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00687" /><CodeLine lineNumber="687"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;LDist: Found a candidate loop: &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00688" /><CodeLine lineNumber="688"><Highlight kind="normal">                      &lt;&lt; L-&gt;getHeader()-&gt;getName() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00689" /><CodeLine lineNumber="689"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00690" /><CodeLine lineNumber="690"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-loopdistribute-cpp-/instpartitioncontainer">InstPartitionContainer</a> Partitions(L, LI, DT);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00691" /><CodeLine lineNumber="691"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00692" /><CodeLine lineNumber="692"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// First, go through each memory operation and assign them to consecutive</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00693" /><CodeLine lineNumber="693"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// partitions (the order of partitions follows program order).  Put those</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00694" /><CodeLine lineNumber="694"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// with unsafe dependences into &quot;cyclic&quot; partition otherwise put each store</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00695" /><CodeLine lineNumber="695"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// in its own &quot;non-cyclic&quot; partition (we&#39;ll merge these later).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00696" /><CodeLine lineNumber="696"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00697" /><CodeLine lineNumber="697"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Note that a memory operation (e.g. Load2 below) at a program point that</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00698" /><CodeLine lineNumber="698"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// has an unsafe dependence (Store3-&gt;Load1) spanning over it must be</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00699" /><CodeLine lineNumber="699"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// included in the same cyclic partition as the dependent operations.  This</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00700" /><CodeLine lineNumber="700"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// is to preserve the original program order after distribution.  E.g.:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00701" /><CodeLine lineNumber="701"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00702" /><CodeLine lineNumber="702"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//                NumUnsafeDependencesStartOrEnd  NumUnsafeDependencesActive</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00703" /><CodeLine lineNumber="703"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  Load1   -.                     1                       0-&gt;1</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00704" /><CodeLine lineNumber="704"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  Load2    | /Unsafe/            0                       1</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00705" /><CodeLine lineNumber="705"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  Store3  -&#39;                    -1                       1-&gt;0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00706" /><CodeLine lineNumber="706"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  Load4                          0                       0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00707" /><CodeLine lineNumber="707"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00708" /><CodeLine lineNumber="708"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// NumUnsafeDependencesActive &gt; 0 indicates this situation and in this case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00709" /><CodeLine lineNumber="709"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// we just keep assigning to the same cyclic partition until</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00710" /><CodeLine lineNumber="710"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// NumUnsafeDependencesActive reaches 0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00711" /><CodeLine lineNumber="711"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memorydepchecker">MemoryDepChecker</a> &amp;DepChecker = LAI-&gt;getDepChecker();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00712" /><CodeLine lineNumber="712"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-loopdistribute-cpp-/memoryinstructiondependences">MemoryInstructionDependences</a> MID(DepChecker.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memorydepchecker/#a77779b1cb3dd7968c598f9d6de68282e">getMemoryInstructions</a>(),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00713" /><CodeLine lineNumber="713"><Highlight kind="normal">                                     &#42;Dependences);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00714" /><CodeLine lineNumber="714"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00715" /><CodeLine lineNumber="715"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumUnsafeDependencesActive = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00716" /><CodeLine lineNumber="716"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;InstDep : MID) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00717" /><CodeLine lineNumber="717"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = InstDep.Inst;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00718" /><CodeLine lineNumber="718"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We update NumUnsafeDependencesActive post-instruction, catch the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00719" /><CodeLine lineNumber="719"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// start of a dependence directly via NumUnsafeDependencesStartOrEnd.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00720" /><CodeLine lineNumber="720"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (NumUnsafeDependencesActive ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00721" /><CodeLine lineNumber="721"><Highlight kind="normal">          InstDep.NumUnsafeDependencesStartOrEnd &gt; 0)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00722" /><CodeLine lineNumber="722"><Highlight kind="normal">        Partitions.<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-loopdistribute-cpp-/instpartitioncontainer/#ad3b1855aab0d6db5fca73b22ba442b50">addToCyclicPartition</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00723" /><CodeLine lineNumber="723"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00724" /><CodeLine lineNumber="724"><Highlight kind="normal">        Partitions.<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-loopdistribute-cpp-/instpartitioncontainer/#ae2c300c4031c2ec4a11e3099f7997826">addToNewNonCyclicPartition</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00725" /><CodeLine lineNumber="725"><Highlight kind="normal">      NumUnsafeDependencesActive += InstDep.NumUnsafeDependencesStartOrEnd;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00726" /><CodeLine lineNumber="726"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(NumUnsafeDependencesActive &gt;= 0 &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00727" /><CodeLine lineNumber="727"><Highlight kind="normal">             </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Negative number of dependences active&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00728" /><CodeLine lineNumber="728"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00729" /><CodeLine lineNumber="729"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00730" /><CodeLine lineNumber="730"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Add partitions for values used outside.  These partitions can be out of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00731" /><CodeLine lineNumber="731"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// order from the original program order.  This is OK because if the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00732" /><CodeLine lineNumber="732"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// partition uses a load we will merge this partition with the original</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00733" /><CodeLine lineNumber="733"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// partition of the load that we set up in the previous loop (see</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00734" /><CodeLine lineNumber="734"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// mergeToAvoidDuplicatedLoads).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00894" /><CodeLine lineNumber="894"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Filter out checks between pointers from the same partition.</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00909" /><CodeLine lineNumber="909"><Highlight kind="normal">                  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Only include this check if there is a pair of pointers</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00910" /><CodeLine lineNumber="910"><Highlight kind="normal">                  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// that require checking and the pointers fall into</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00911" /><CodeLine lineNumber="911"><Highlight kind="normal">                  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// separate partitions.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00912" /><CodeLine lineNumber="912"><Highlight kind="normal">                  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00914" /><CodeLine lineNumber="914"><Highlight kind="normal">                  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// pointer groups need checking but it doesn&#39;t follow</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00916" /><CodeLine lineNumber="916"><Highlight kind="normal">                  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// checking as well.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00917" /><CodeLine lineNumber="917"><Highlight kind="normal">                  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00918" /><CodeLine lineNumber="918"><Highlight kind="normal">                  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// In other words we don&#39;t want to include a check just</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00919" /><CodeLine lineNumber="919"><Highlight kind="normal">                  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// because there is a pair of pointers between the two</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00920" /><CodeLine lineNumber="920"><Highlight kind="normal">                  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// pointer groups that require checks and a different</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
